lines.content: * Represents a robot that takes in tasks given by user through CLI, and other requests such as
* listing all tasks, deleting tasks, adding tasks and marking tasks.

* Starts serving the user in CLI.

public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage);
* Checks whether command is an Exit Command.

* Represents an Exit Command, which quits Duke's service to user.

* @param tasks All tasks present in Duke.
* @param ui The UI controller that handles interaction between user and Duke.
* @param storage Storage that stores all tasks on Disk.
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents a List Command, which lists all tasks.
* Executes the command and lists all tasks to the user.

* @param storage Storage that stores all tasks on Disk.
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents a Mark Command, which marks a task as completed.

* @param storage Storage that stores all tasks on Disk.
